B40B8906A4E84B2B83430EBF6D8BDD3E.description: Disseminate/convey to  the public data and news about the school, community and the local area/the nation in foreign languages.

3DE05FC11C23466AB8238B0523B41848.description: Use foreign languages in conducting research, collecting, analysing and summarising knowledge/various data from the media and different learning sources for further education and livelihood.

545F790AD79848EB820104529335C354.description: Usage of foreign languages as basic tools for further education, livelihood and exchange of learning with the world community.

A6C400B937594B4E8025782D0C2573F2.description: Use language for communication in real situations/simulated situations in the classroom, school, community and society.

8CE4A2B012534EE4AEAC821A1B0A9541.description: Ability to use foreign languages in various situations in school, community and society.

C9A6BA40B50B4B0EB71378979892D958.description: Research/search for, make records, summarise and express opinions about the data related to other learning areas, and present them through speaking and writing.

62125BBDA05842DE9E150BE5C85A36B6.description: Usage of foreign languages to link knowledge with other learning areas, as foundation for further development and to seek knowledge and widen one's world view.

8C9F1073218E45419F1B64DA0669F851.description: Analyse/discuss similarities and differences between the lifestyles, beliefs and culture of native speakers and those of  Thais, and apply them appropriately.

69AE507C8DB94CCDA9C00FF56CA842B7.description: Explain/compare differences between the structures of sentences, texts, idioms, sayings, proverbs and poems in foreign languages and Thai language.

C81DC521974747A199C3C5655C0DD609.description: Appreciation of similarities and differences between language and culture of native and Thai speakers, and capacity for accurate and appropriate use of language.

3194DCF6902D4EC6B224CAEA63CD68F3.description: Participate in, give advice and organise language and cultural activities appropriately.

3C68B0D51A4D4652B3208D3BB25EE7E7.description: Explain/discuss the lifestyles, thoughts, beliefs and origins of customs and traditions of native speakers.

ED4C6E28B84C4F5EB206CCA6A5264E5B.description: Choose the language, tone of voice, gestures and manners appropriate to various persons, occasions and places by observing social manners and culture of native speakers.

1825A493098541008EEAFE61032F5B74.description: Appreciation of the relationship between language and culture of native speakers and capacity for use of language appropriate to occasions and places.

413A6AC6A7704116BAB3012AAB489319.description: Speak and write to express opinions about activities, experiences and incidents in the local area, society and the world, as well as provide justifications and examples for illustration.

D4C788C63C334845A8B26FA0AF36A39E.description: Speak and write to summarise the main idea/theme identified from analysis of matters, activities, news, incidents and situations in accordance with their interests.

B7BC08E60C8D4D769DB80ED2685EA275.description: Speak and write to present data themselves/experiences, news/incidents, matters and various issues of interest to society.

619796A0BC1E45899AD43BB05FE37D90.description: Ability to present data, information, concepts and views about various matters through speaking and writing.

E47B7FC14D2E4AF88EF4EC95D541AEBC.description: Speak and write to describe their own feelings and opinions about various matters, activities, experiences and news/ incidents with proper reasoning.

81E9BCF09C6448B5B6AF399E7C15CCDD.description: Speak and write appropriately to ask for and give data, describe, explain, compare and express opinions about matters/ issues/news and situations heard and read.

0E869ABB51D74DAD9B28DE0F4465F3BD.description: Speak and write to express needs and offer, accept and refuse to give help in simulated or real situations.

3D51AC02D42C42E497252F7CF31845C7.description: Choose and use requests and give instructions, clarifications and explanations fluently.

3541B9D0AB70443481FF68477176B2EE.description: Converse and write to exchange data about themselves and various matters around them, experiences, situations, news/incidents and issues of  interest to society, and communicate the data continuously and appropriately.

C8A59B44249F4E5A843DF038F7A5295F.description: Endowment with language communication skills for exchange of data and information; efficient expression of feelings and opinions.

411B02952F6A4129877EE8449EC0D457.description: Identify the main idea, analyse the essence, interpret and express opinions from listening to and reading feature articles and entertainment articles, as well as provide justifications and examples for illustration.

B4BBED280DAD4D83984A2C8FCD44F179.description: Explain and write sentences and texts related to various forms of non-text information, as well as specify and write various forms of non-text information related to sentences and texts heard or read.

D130A9AF953745D38079F6B1C2D854C9.description: Accurately read aloud texts, news, advertisements, poems and skits by observing the principles of reading.

A29DF0E26E804A88B46FCD065A0F250D.description: Observe instructions in manuals for various types of work, clarifications, explanations and descriptions heard and read.

C442CF4B427E49B08D7D7AAEEA42448B.description: Understanding of and capacity to interpret what has been heard and read from various types of media, and ability to express opinions with proper reasoning.
